title: Improving Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills through Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A PBL-based process for professionals to solve real-world mathematical challenges encountered in their work, utilizing digital devices for data analysis and collaborative tools.

learning_goals: Learners can solve mathematical problems occurring in real occupational contexts with over 80% accuracy using PBL approaches
Learners achieve 3 or more points (out of 4) in teamwork and communication skills evaluations through project performance
Learners independently resolve over 75% of problems encountered during the execution of self-directed learning plans
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
